import React from 'react'; import './PostCard.css'; const PostCard = ({onReserveClick, Name, price, url, description, route}) => { if (route === 'mealposts'){ return(

{Name}

{`$${price}`}

{

{description}

}
Reserve
) } else if (route === 'reserved'){ return(

{Name}

{`$${price}`}

Complete
) } else { return(

{Name}

{`$${price}`}

{

}

) } } export default PostCard;
